body:
Hello, 
  I am experiencing a consistent error message that I could not overcome.  After the attempt to run simulation in Daysim 3.1  there`s the error message:  c:/daysim/bin_windows/oconv: warning-zero area for polygon "zone01.rad00013"  
  Further on it draws the problem to "raypath c:\daysim\lib`.  stil I haveve added the Radiance\bin\. and Daysim\bin\. and Radiance\lib\., Daysim\lib\. to the environmental variables in Raypath and Path manually(working on Windows7)  
  I am analysing orbitrory sensor points that Ive generated with a script from ecotect(zero polygon area I suppose describes that)  
  How do you read such message to proceed completing a visualization?  
  Kind Regards,  Niya
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-daysim/2014-October/000076.html).</sup>
